sec-proxycreate.title: #sec-proxycreate ProxyCreate ( target, handler )
sec-proxycreate.html:
#sec-proxycreate ProxyCreate ( target, handler )

The abstract operation ProxyCreate with arguments target and handler is used to specify the creation of new Proxy exotic objects. It performs the following steps:

  1. If Type(target) is not Object, throw a TypeError exception.
  2. If target is a Proxy exotic object and target.[[ProxyHandler]] is null, throw a TypeError exception.
  3. If Type(handler) is not Object, throw a TypeError exception.
  4. If handler is a Proxy exotic object and handler.[[ProxyHandler]] is null, throw a TypeError exception.
  5. Let P be a newly created Proxy exotic object with internal slots [[ProxyTarget]] and [[ProxyHandler]].
  6. Set P's essential internal methods (except for [[Call]] and [[Construct]]) to the definitions specified in #sec-proxy-object-internal-methods-and-internal-slots.
  7. If IsCallable(target) is true, then
    1. Set P.[[Call]] as specified in #sec-proxy-object-internal-methods-and-internal-slots-call-thisargument-argumentslist.
    2. If IsConstructor(target) is true, then
      1. Set P.[[Construct]] as specified in #sec-proxy-object-internal-methods-and-internal-slots-construct-argumentslist-newtarget.
  8. Set P.[[ProxyTarget]] to target.
  9. Set P.[[ProxyHandler]] to handler.
  10. Return P.

sec-proxycreate.title: #sec-proxycreate ProxyCreate ( target, handler )
sec-proxycreate.html:
#sec-proxycreate ProxyCreate ( target, handler )

The abstract operation ProxyCreate with arguments target and handler is used to specify the creation of new Proxy exotic objects. It performs the following steps:

  1. If Type(target) is not Object, throw a TypeError exception.
  2. If Type(handler) is not Object, throw a TypeError exception.
  3. Let P be a newly created Proxy exotic object with internal slots [[ProxyTarget]] and [[ProxyHandler]].
  4. Set P's essential internal methods (except for [[Call]] and [[Construct]]) to the definitions specified in #sec-proxy-object-internal-methods-and-internal-slots.
  5. If IsCallable(target) is true, then
    1. Set P.[[Call]] as specified in #sec-proxy-object-internal-methods-and-internal-slots-call-thisargument-argumentslist.
    2. If IsConstructor(target) is true, then
      1. Set P.[[Construct]] as specified in #sec-proxy-object-internal-methods-and-internal-slots-construct-argumentslist-newtarget.
  6. Set P.[[ProxyTarget]] to target.
  7. Set P.[[ProxyHandler]] to handler.
  8. Return P.
